title: Save on Solo Stoves, Coleman camping gear, and Igloo coolers ahead of October Prime Day
content: Amazon's October Prime Day deals have dropped prices on the Solo Stove Bonfire 2.0, Coleman camping gear, and Igloo coolers by up to 28%.
